Name: SBA Payment Protection Program
Other Details: Funds can only be used to pay payroll costs (including benefits), interest on mortgages, rent, and utilities. The loan will be fully forgiven as long as 75% of the funds are used to cover payroll costs over an eight week period after the loan is made

Name: USA Small Business Administration
Other Details: Enables small businesses who currently have a business relationship with an SBA Express Lender to access up to $25,000 quickly. See here https://www.sba.gov/document/support--express-bridge-loan-pilot-program-guide
